name: Bone Master
description:
Made with love for the GMTK Game Jame 2021. Please enjoy, we'd like to hear your comments!

A small puzzle game where you control a skull on a journey to become a Bone Master! You must have at least 1 (one) bone to play this game. 

Credits:

Skull, pig, bone, wall icons: by VectorPixelStar: https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/ under license: CC BY-ND 4.0  https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nd/4.0/

Keyboard, wsad icons:  Made by Smashicons (https://smashicons.com/) from https://www.flaticon.com/

Everything else (code, graphics, whatever) by us.
